Query.Sql: select NHSNumber as nhs_number, coalesce(max(ReferralToTreatmentPeriodEndDate), max(CDSActivityDate)) as death_date from [omop_staging].[sus_AE] where ((ReferralToTreatmentPeriodStatus = 36) --PATIENT died before treatment or (AEPatientGroup = 70) -- PATIENT brought in dead or (AEAttendanceDisposal = 10)) --PATIENT died in AE and (CDSActivityDate is not null or ReferralToTreatmentPeriodEndDate is not null) and NHSNumber is not null group by NHSNumber

Explanation.Description: Discharge date of the patient's spell.
